mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_bookinfo (bookName, publisher, publishTime, introduction, ISBN13, price, realStoreNum, typeId) VALUES( #{bookName}, #{publisher}, #{publishTime}, #{introduction}, #{ISBN13}, #{price}, #{realStoreNum}, #{typeId} )
mapper.update: update tb_bookinfo SET bookName = #{bookName}, publisher = #{publisher}, publishTime = #{publishTime}, introduction = #{introduction}, ISBN13 = #{ISBN13}, price = #{price}, realStoreNum = #{realStoreNum}, typeId = #{typeId}, state = #{state} WHERE bookId = #{bookId}
